title: A Reason to Do Your Best
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Haah, haah….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You’re doing well, Hanayo<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>This step is really hard after all~. Why can you do it so easily, Eli-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>It’s not like it’s easy for me to do. It’s just that I’m used to moving my body to the rhythm. Come, you almost got it, right? Let’s keep trying<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That’s right, I’ll do my best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yes, just like that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah! We’re going to surprise everyone at our next live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I was really surprised when you and Honoka said that you wanted to make the stage based on a pool, but with this, we might be able to give a performance fitting of our stage, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe. I’m glad everyone agreed on it~. Speaking of which, Kotori-chan said that she’s finished with the designs of the costumes we asked her for. Let’s check it out after this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, I’ll look forward to it. Then, let’s master this step quickly!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
